We would like a new law that states if you commit  crime and continue to commit crime with a disregard for the law then on your 3rd offence there should be a
mandatory sentence handed down with a long prison sentance regardless if the crimes were petty ones.
There has to be more respect given to the laws of this country, there has to be rules that demand this respect, if the rules are broken then the tariff given should reflect this.
